sub_title: Sr. BI Data Analyst at Cargill
summary:
IT professional with over 13 years of experience in Data warehousing and Data & Analytics solution implementations

Specialties:
- ETL/ELT process architecture and design for data warehousing and Audit analytics process 
- Hands on experience of the Dimensional modelling concepts, enterprise data models and data-warehouse design methodology using Kimball approach. 
- Good understanding of the SAP based PTP process, exposure to GL and OTC processes. End to end implementation of the D&A solutions based on the SAP data models. 
- Audit data & Analytics for Internal and external Audit processes 
- Requirement gathering for Audit analytics solution design based on supply chain processes.
- Co-coordinate with Clients IT team to extract data from ERP systems including data cleansing, data profiling. 
- Involved in SAP BODI/BODS (Business Object Data Services) Projects for End-to-End implementation, Data migration and up-gradation
- Design and development of the D&A reporting solutions using – Power BI 
- Hands on experience in SQL Queries, Python, Power-BI, Alteryx ETL tool, SAP BODS and UNIX scripts. 
- Basic hands-on experience on Apache Impala platform, CDP.

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for design and development of Internal audit data analytics solutions for Procure-to-Pay processes
- Requirement gathering for Internal audit analytics design and development based on supply chain processes
- Enterprise data model design, Metadata and master data management
- Understanding the SAP data models and extract the data used for different reporting purposes
- Develop the business logic using SQL scripts and using Apache Impala platform
- Develop reporting solutions using Power BI
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for development and deployment of KPMG D&A solutions for Audit data & Analytics
- Coordinate with client IT teams to extract data from major ERP systems ( such as SAP and Oracle)
- Coordinate with the engagement teams to release the KPMG audit procedures & reports during the audit cycles for Order to Cash, Porcure to Pay and GL processes
- Design and development of ETL processes for Custom Audit reporting requirements
- Development of custom reporting requirements 
- Enterprise data model & Dimensional modelling for development of different Data & Analytics solutions
- Leading team of 5+ team members to deploy KPMG Audit Analytics (KAAP /Clara) solutions across different clients
- Participate in sales meeting along with Business teams for proposals and providing the KPMG Audit data Analytics offerings
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Design and development of ETL processes using SAP BODS for extraction of data from various sources, data migration and for data warehouse solution implementation
- Dimensional modelling to create the data marts at enterprise level as per the business requirements
- Requirements gathering and project estimations for data warehousing project
- Involved in the preparation of test scripts, unit testing
- Creating semantic views in Teradata as source and target
- Creating the technical design document for data warehousing and BI project implementations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Programmer
